# AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy.keepCurrent

**Case**

A policy to keep the string’s current attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
case keepCurrent
```

## Merge Policies

- **AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy.keepNew**: A policy to keep the newly-merged attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.

items.description: A policy to keep the newly-merged attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.
items.name: AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy.keepNew
